<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Provide access to the Option info table.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The OptTable class provides a layer of indirection which allows Option</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instance to be created lazily. In the common case, only a few options will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be needed at runtime; the OptTable class maintains enough information to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// parse command lines without instantiating Options, while letting other</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// parts of the driver still use Option instances where convenient.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Find the OptTable option that most closely matches the given string.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param &#91;in&#93; Option - A string, such as &quot;-stdlibs=l&quot;, that represents user</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Parse an list of arguments into an InputArgList.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The resulting InputArgList will reference the strings in &#91;\\p ArgBegin,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p ArgEnd), and their lifetime should extend past that of the returned</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// InputArgList.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The only error that can occur in this routine is if an argument is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// missing values; in this case \\p MissingArgCount will be non-zero.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param MissingArgIndex - On error, the index of the option which could</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// not be parsed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param MissingArgCount - On error, the number of missing options.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param VisibilityMask - Only include options with any of these</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// visibility flags set.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return An InputArgList; on error this will contain all the options</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// which could be parsed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/inputarglist">InputArgList</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable/#aae1e1c17454fb6433f039b5fb02c5c4d">ParseArgs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;const char &#42;&gt;</a> Args, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;MissingArgIndex,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// could be parsed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Render the help text for an option table.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param OS - The stream to write the help text to.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Usage - USAGE: Usage</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Title - OVERVIEW: Title</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param VisibilityMask - Only in                 Visibility VisibilityMask,clude options with any of these</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                         visibility flags set.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ShowHidden     - If true, display options marked as HelpHidden</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ShowAllAliases - If true, display all options including aliases</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                         that don&#39;t have help texts. By default, we display</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                         only options that are not hidden and have help</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                         texts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
